name: BoxTuber
description:
Box your way to the top and fight some of the biggest internet stars, KSI, True Geordie and The Sidemen in BoxTuber!

Your mission is to become the biggest & baddest BoxTuber on the planet by crushing every challenge and answering every call out.

- Create your own BoxTuber character & fight your way to the top!
- Fight the world's biggest YouTubers in Career & Arcade Mode
- Build your own channel, post videos, gain views and subs in Career Mode
- Customise your character with exclusive merch

Download now and start your BoxTuber career today!
